testcase.classname: US1014 Automation exercise sitesinde kullanici olusturma
testcase.name: TC19 Kullanici automation exercise sayfasinde kullanici olusturabilmeli
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "automationUrl" anasayfaya gider............................passed And user sign up linkine tiklar.............................................passed And user Create and account bolumune email adresi girer.....................passed And Create an account butonuna basar........................................passed And user kisisel bilgilerini ve iletisim bilgilerini girer..................passed And user Register butonuna basar............................................passed Then hesap olustugunu dogrulayin............................................passed
